title: Interactive User Journeys
description: Interactive Animated Consumer Pathways/Custom Editorial Interface/Drupal Performance. This effort included a lot of research and development in cutting edge Web Component technology and lays the groundwork for a future version of Bolt built completely on Web Components.

setup up a live DOM editor trained to recognize the web components and allow content authors to edit sites inline
